de.iss.mv2.data

Class EncryptedExportable

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.data.Exportable
      • de.iss.mv2.data.EncryptedExportable

  • public class EncryptedExportable
extends Exportable
    Defines a encryption-wrapper for other binary exportable objects.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
